00039 struct XPI_IMSG_HEADER
00040 {
00041     uchar magicMSB;   // magic: '@'
00042     uchar magicLSB;   // magic: '!'
00043     uchar type;       // XPI_IMSG_TYPE
00044     uchar subtype;    // type dependent qualifier
00045     ulong timeStamp;
00046 
00047     } ATTR_PACKED; // Total size 8 octets
00048 
00049 struct XPI_OMSG_HEADER
00050 {
00051     uchar magicMSB;   // magic: '@'
00052     uchar magicLSB;   // magic: '!'
00053     uchar type;       // XPI_OMSG_TYPE
00054     uchar subtype;    // type dependent qualifier
00055 
00056     } ATTR_PACKED; // Total size 4 octets
00057 
00058 struct XPI_SHORT_MSG : public XPI_IMSG_HEADER
00059 {
00060     uchar data[ 8 ];
00061 
00062     } ATTR_PACKED; // Total size 16 octets
00063 
00064 struct XPI_LONG_MSG : public XPI_IMSG_HEADER
00065 {
00066     uchar data[ 24 ]; // Max 18 octets of SC data
00067 
00068     } ATTR_PACKED; // Total size 32 octets

00097     xMUTEX semaMutex;
00098     xSEMA semaFull;
00099     xSEMA semaEmpty;
00100     xSEMA semaSent;
00101 
00102     // Circular buffer of MSGBUF packets.
00103     // MSGBUF length is max 32 octets, so the circular buffer last packet
00104     // crossing pMax is not split, rather it is kept complete over pMax boundary
00105     // so it could be accessed directly with linear functions like memcpy().
00106     //
00107     // MSGBUF Packet format:
00108     //    Header:
00109     //       uint8 len_MSB
00110     //       uint8 len_LSB
00111     //    Body:
00112     //       uint8 data[len]
00113     //
00114     uchar  buf[ XPI_XMTR_BUF_SIZE + 32 ];
00115     uint   bufSize;
00116 
00117     uchar* pRead;
00118     uchar* pWrite;
00119     uchar* pMax;
00120 
00121     volatile uint ctx_count;
00122     uchar* pCtx;
00123     int    ctx_status;
00124 
00125     void LockWrite( void )
00126     {
00127         // Lock pWrite mutex
00128         //
00129         do ; while( ! semaMutex.Lock( 100 ) );
00130         }
00131 
00132     void UnlockWrite( void )
00133     {
00134         // Unlock pWrite mutex
00135         //
00136         semaMutex.Unlock ();
00137         }
00138     
00139     enum STATE
00140     {

00147         POLL_EIRQ             = 6,
00148         RECEIVE_CRX           = 7,
00149         RECEIVE_CTX           = 8
00150         };

00183     void Goto( STATE new_state, long timeout = -1 )
00184     {
00185 #if 0        
00186         taskENTER_CRITICAL ();
00187         tracef( 2, "--: %d -> %d\n", state, new_state );
00188         taskEXIT_CRITICAL ();
00189 #endif        
00190         state = new_state;
00191         timer = timeout < 0 ? -1 : timeout; // timeout in ms
00192         extern volatile ulong dTimerTick;
00193         lastTick = dTimerTick;
00194         }
00195 
00196     long GetNextTimeout( void ) const
00197     {
00198         return timer < 0 || timer > 20 ? 20 : timer;
00199         }
